overview: From 2025-04-02 to 2025-04-03, elizaos/eliza had 16 new PRs (14 merged), 7 new issues, and 18 active contributors.

completedItems.title: add node_modules to .gitignore
completedItems.body: node_modules wasnt in the gitignore in plugin-starter template, resulting in trouble pushing the plugin repo to github. added it so it works well.
